programme.title: Black Sunday [English-Language Version]
programme.desc: A vengeful witch and her fiendish servant return from the grave and begin a bloody campaign to possess the body of the witch's beautiful look-alike descendant.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: The Devil's Wedding Night
programme.desc: A quest for the mythical Ring of Vermougglian leads the Schiller brothers to Transylvania and Castle Dracula.

programme.title: Night Of The Seagulls [Spanish-Language Version]
programme.desc: A doctor and his wife move to a small inhospitable coastal village to discover that undead demon-worshiping Templar Knights haunt the place.

programme.title: Kill, Baby...Kill!
programme.desc: A Carpathian village is haunted by the ghost of a murderous little girl, prompting a coroner and a medical student to uncover her secrets while a witch attempts to protect the villagers.

programme.title: Succubus
programme.desc: A struggling new father joins a dating app, only to swipe right on what may be an inhuman presence.

programme.title: The Lawnmower Man (Director's Cut)
programme.desc: Dr. Lawrence Angelo (Pierce Brosnan) is a brilliant scientist obsessed with perfecting virtual reality software. When his experiments on animals fail, he finds the ideal substitute - Jobe Smith (Jeff Fahey), a slow-witted gardener.

programme.title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
programme.desc: They thought they had destroyed him, but the simple gardener-turned-superkiller has found a way to reboot himself in Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace.

programme.title: Magic
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins and Ann-Margret star in this thriller about a ventriloquist whose dummy seems to have a mind of its own.

programme.title: Demons of the Mind
programme.desc: A physician discovers that two children are being kept virtually imprisoned in their house by their father.

programme.title: Sorority House Massacre
programme.desc: College student Beth and her sorority sisters are stalked by an escaped psychopathic killer who shares a strange telepathic link with her.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Beast From Haunted Cave
programme.desc: A revamping, if you will, of the 1980's classic horror movie showcase, hosted by Elvira, Mistress of the Dark.

programme.title: Itsy Bitsy
programme.desc: Based on the centuries old poem, a family moves into a secluded mansion where they soon find themselves being targeted by an entity taking the form of a giant spider.

programme.title: Vampire Circus
programme.desc: As the plague sweeps the countryside, a quarantined village is visited by a mysterious traveling circus. Soon, young children begin to disappear, and the locals suspect the circus troupe might be hiding a horrifying secret.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000
programme.desc: Joel's crew watch as a paranormal investigator tries to save the world in DEMON SQUAD (2019), and the original test subject returns.
